Hi,

I have a job profile which re-visits my seeds every day without going =
out of the seed domain

In term of performance, is it better, for example :=

- having 300 jobs with 1 seed
- having 1 jobs with 300 seeds
- having X jo=
bs with Y seeds (in that case, how to determine the value of X and Y) ?

anks
